H0.text: Who wrote One-upmanship and The Theory and Practice of Gamesmanship. Stephen Potter

H1.text: Who wrote One-upmanship and The Theory and Practice of Gamesmanship. P.G. Wodehouse

H2.text: Who wrote One-upmanship and The Theory and Practice of Gamesmanship. George Orwell

H3.text: Who wrote One-upmanship and The Theory and Practice of Gamesmanship. Lifemanship

A4.text: Stephen Potter wrote The Theory and Practice of Gamesmanship, which was published in 1947.

A5.text: Stephen Potter authored One-Upmanship, published in 1952.
